subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets came back to tie the score with two runs off Phillies closer Jonathan Papelbon, but a homer by pinch-hitter Kevin Frandsen in the bottom of the ninth ended the game.
snippet: The Mets came back to tie the score with two runs off Phillies closer Jonathan Papelbon, but a homer by pinch-hitter Kevin Frandsen in the bottom of the ninth ended the game.
